title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1035.7 - Paratransit service requests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1035.7 - Paratransit service requests

State Regulations
(a) Advance reservation service. An ADA-paratransit-eligible individual may request
an advance reservation trip by calling during the reservation period set forth
in subdivision (b) of this section. Reservations may be requested between the
hours of 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., except as otherwise specified below, seven days per
week. (b) Minimum and maximum times
for reserving a paratransit trip are as follows: (1)
1993: no earlier than 72 hours before the
requested day; no later than 3 p.m. of the day before; (2)
1994: no earlier than seven days before
the requested day; no later than 5 p.m. of the day before; (3)
1995 and thereafter: no earlier than 14
days before the requested day; no later than 5 p.m. of the day
before. (c) Subscription
service: (1)

An ADA-paratransit-eligible
individual may apply for subscription service by completing an application for
such service in the form prescribed by the authority. (2)

The authority may establish waiting lists
or other capacity constraints and trip purpose restrictions or priorities for
participation in subscription service. Subscription service shall be limited to
no more than 50 percent of paratransit service capacity at any given time of
day if all advance reservation requests at that time of day cannot be
accommodated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1035.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
